price: 78.Ku Rabbih migaq saytuniih, kay kayri maggoh, usuk dudda le nabna leeh, kaal yeemene marah mattaccoo leeh, konnaba le.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
